New Records: Ezequiel Tovar's NL-leading 45th double of the season
Charlie Blackmon's 227th career home run, tying Carlos Gonzalez for fifth in franchise history
Key Match Events: Charlie Blackmon had three RBIs and three runs
Michael Toglia had three hits and two RBIs
Ezequiel Tovar's game-tying double in the eighth inning
Ryan McMahon's double that brought home the eventual winning run
Paul Goldschmidt hit a 457-foot solo home run
Lars Nootbaar hit his 11th home run of the season
Pedro Pagés and Ivan Herrera also homered for the Cardinals
Post-Match Reflections: Charlie Blackmon expressed his desire to enjoy his final games
Ryan McMahon discussed the team's goal to avoid a 100-loss season
Cardinals manager Oliver Marmol reflected on the loss and praised Ryan Fernandez's performance throughout the year
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockies need to win two out of three games against the Los Angeles Dodgers to avoid their second 100-loss season
The loss snapped a four-game win streak for the Cardinals
Charlie Blackmon's father threw out the ceremonial first pitch
Others: Cardinals placed LHP JoJo Romero on the 15-day injured list and recalled RHP Chris Roycroft
Rockies' RHP Ryan Feltner will start the season finale against the Dodgers
